io.github.bananapuncher714.crafters.implementation.API

Interface PublicCraftingInventory


  • public interface PublicCraftingInventory
    This is a representation of a public workbench inventory; Created on 2017-12-07
    Author:
    BananaPuncher714

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getBukkitItems()
      Get all the items in the inventory, may be null;
      CraftDisplay getCraftDisplay()
      This is the CraftDisplay for this table.
      org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
      Get the location of the table
      org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getResult()
      Get the ItemStack of the crafting recipe's result
      java.util.UUID getUUID()
      Get this table's unique ID;
      PublicCraftingInventory move(org.bukkit.Location location)
      Move this instance to a new location
      void remove()
      Remove the inventory in its entirety, includes cleaning up the CraftDisplay.
      void update()
      Update the inventory, will remove itself if there is not a workbench at its current location.

    • Method Detail

      • getBukkitItems

        java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getBukkitItems()
        Get all the items in the inventory, may be null;
        Returns:
        Returns a list of Bukkit itemstacks.

      • getUUID

        java.util.UUID getUUID()
        Get this table's unique ID;
        Returns:
        Returns a unique ID for this session, does not persist across reloads

      • getLocation

        org.bukkit.Location getLocation()
        Get the location of the table
        Returns:
        May change if the table is moved by pistons

      • getCraftDisplay

        CraftDisplay getCraftDisplay()
        This is the CraftDisplay for this table.
        Returns:
        Creates a new CraftDisplay whenever move(Location) is called

      • remove

        void remove()
        Remove the inventory in its entirety, includes cleaning up the CraftDisplay.

      • move

        PublicCraftingInventory move(org.bukkit.Location location)
        Move this instance to a new location
        Parameters:
        location - The new location of the table
        Returns:
        The table that occupies the location currently.

      • update

        void update()
        Update the inventory, will remove itself if there is not a workbench at its current location.

      • getResult

        org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getResult()
        Get the ItemStack of the crafting recipe's result
        Returns:
        A Bukkit ItemStack
